snippet.title: OBSIDIENNE - Trailer
snippet.description:
Play at : https://team-obsidienne.itch.io/obsidienne

OBSIDIENNE is a FPS/Platformer with a hard focus on speedrunning behaviours.
Play as a runner capable of slicing level design elements in a mysterious environment. This gameplay mechanic coupled with advanced movement interactions allows us to offer a sequence of interesting situations to players in which they'll have to go as fast as possible.

Thanks to performance ratings and leaderboards we induce the player to master our gameplay and maybe beat our levels best times.
